title: Security Certificate Alert
body:
Hey,

When i log in to my acc, after a few minutes a certificate error comes up (when I play League Of Legends). Here is the picture with the certificate. (http://www.uppic.com/uploads/14278471221.jpg)
Whether i install it or not, or fix the date time, once it happens it changes every few minutes.

I even deactivated the automatic date/ time sync with the internet.

Is there anything else i can do?
Windows updates are all installed.
When I press the issuer statement, the following site comes up : https://www.digicert.com/ssl-cps-repository.htm
Also updated the IE!

I have already contacted the Riot Games and they have no solutions (what a surprise!).
This happens only when the LoL Client is on whether I am in a game or not.

Regards!

replies.body:
Could you attach the screenshot as an attachment to the post? I don't like clicking on random links from strangers on the internet.

Have you tried setting your Internet Options security to Medium-Low?
